divs: Sighting Detailsafter having seen somthing very questionable earlier that night and spotting something very similar later on I felt it was appropriate to fill out two separate reports. The two sightings were similar in that they both became extremely bright letting off white light both either getting bigger or this may have been an effect from the lights brightness. So after what I had sighted earlier I kept popping back out side from time to time due to the fact it was nice out and there was clear visibility that night.I had been looking up and saw what I thought to be a lil satilite.as I watched it was shifting from green to blue in color moving at about a pace which a satelite would then all the sudden it almost tripled size or more as it became a very bright white cirlce then returned to its pin point size never changed speed and continued on over the horizon at which point I lost sight of the object.
